amendment.description: To provide Medicare beneficiaries with a drug discount card that ensures access to affordable prescription drugs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1026 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 21 - 75. Record Vote Number: 260.

action.text: Amendment SA 1026 proposed by Senator Hagel. (consideration: CR S8493) To provide Medicare beneficiaries with a drug discount card that ensures access to affordable prescription drugs.
